name: Github Copilot CLI
tagline: Copilot's response to Claude Code and Codex CLI
description: Copilot CLI is GitHub’s terminal-based coding agent. It accepts instructions, edits files, runs commands, and connects to MCP servers. Defaults to Claude Sonnet 4 but can switch to other models. Usage is billed via Copilot plans.

name: Recal.dev
tagline: Resend, but for Calendar & Scheduling. API. SDK. MCP.
description: Skip months of integration hell. Use our SDK or open source scheduling package to handle everything calendar, simplify OAuth, build robust booking systems, integrate Google, Outlook, and other calendars with one unified API... 51M+ events created.

name: Tab
tagline: World's simplest blog that ranks on AI and SEO
description: Tab is the automated blog that blogs for you. It is built with AI and traditional search engines in mind. It's as simple as entering your website, signing up, making a payment, and forgetting it ever existed. Ideal for early-stage startup founders

name: Zennbox
tagline: Save & organize your resources. Take notes with AI
description: AI based resource management and learning platform. Collect, save & organize all your files, websites, YouTube videos, social media posts and more. Take notes, document learnings and access them from anywhere.

name: Daily Water Reminder
tagline: Hydration tracker for iOS & watchOS
description: Track your daily water intake with beautiful widgets, Apple Watch complications, and smart reminders. Build healthy hydration habits with our intuitive water tracker app for iOS.

name: Git Pushups
tagline: Do pushups or we block your code
description: Block your code if you don't do daily pushups

name: Toopost
tagline: A New Era of RSS Powered by AI
description: Read RSS, Telegram, Facebook, Google & Reddit in one place. Get concise AI summaries, search and highlight text, fact-check claims, monitor brand mentions, and auto-draft articles from your feed.

name: LaTeXWriter
tagline: Best Collaborative LaTeX Editor
description: LaTeX Writer — a fast, collaborative LaTeX editor. Real-time compilation, templates, and PDF export. Start writing LaTeX instantly.

name: Perplexity Search API
tagline: Developers get full index power with instant accuracy
description: The Perplexity Search API gives developers access to the same global-scale infrastructure that powers our public answer engine. With hundreds of billions of webpages indexed, it unlocks internet-wide knowledge through a simple, powerful API

name: To-Doo Boo
tagline: Finish Tasks in Time or Lose Apps — Stay Focused
description: Focus and productivity to-do list app designed to make sure you finish tasks on time. Miss a deadline, and ghosts will haunt you by blocking apps until the task is done. You can also schedule focus sessions to stay distraction-free.

name: Workflow Efficiency Analyzer
tagline: 100% free workflow efficiency analyzer
description: Analyze your business workflows to identify bottlenecks and automation opportunities with our FREE Workflow Efficiency Analyzer by MindPal.

name: lumowrite.com
tagline: distraction free writing
description: distraction-free writing: A clean, uncluttered interface helps you focus on your thoughts. Set a timer. Use light or dark mode. Go full screen. and just write.

name: Notihook
tagline: Stop refreshing. Get notified instead
description: Turn any event into instant push notifications. From payment confirmations to form submissions, server alerts to customer actions, if it can trigger an API, you can get notified. Set up in minutes, customize everything. Your events, your phone, instantly.

name: quietask
tagline: Ask what you feel.
description: quietask is a platform where you can anonymously share questions or concerns with a large community - without fear of judgement or exposure.

name: Ray3 AI
tagline: Ray3 AI—Professional Video Creation Platform
description: Discover Ray3, Luma’s advanced AI video generation model with HDR 16-bit output, reasoning, and keyframe control for cinematic storytelling.

name: Omi
tagline: Pokemon tcg card scanner for real(tru) fans, 17+ language
description: Scan Pokémon TCG cards in seconds. See live prices, history, and manage your collection with multi-language OCR/AI and multi-currency support.

name: Motion Note
tagline: AI Tutor that lives in your notes.
description: An AI tutor that lives in your notes. Generate explainer videos on any topic—education, science, history, or anime. Fast creation with built-in reasoning for long-form, accurate, and visually consistent results. Learn faster, create smarter.

name: Wanimate
tagline: Animate any character from a source video
description: Use the wan 2.2 animate model to replicate holistic movements and expressions from a reference video to bring your characters to life.

name: Beacon (iOS): Real Alarm Reminders
tagline: Never miss an important calendar event again
description: Never miss an appointment or meeting again. Beacon syncs with your Apple Calendar and sets up real system alarms for your important events - alarms that can't be missed (unlike notifications). Built for busy people, shift workers, and neurodivergent folks.

name: TraderIQ
tagline: Master quantitative trading interviews
description: Master quantitative trading interviews with TraderIQ. Practice mental math, brain teasers, and ace interviews at Jane Street, Citadel, Flow Traders.
